reviewText: Good set except does not play continuous for all episodes.

Excellent quality and excellent acting casts. I was deeply inspired in watching all 3 volumes. Great stories from the Upanishad, Bhagavad Gita & Mahabaratha and other Hindu literature/puranas. I would love to see more volumes added!
As with volume 1,these are not just DVD;s but works of Art.
. The English subtitles or books to explain the stories will be of great help. This is a very well done series ,and  will be a great gift to humanity if the language problem can be  solved.

All teachings of Hinduism and upnishad  covered in this series. If you know Hinduism and upnishad teachings, you will understand these episodes of 20 minutes each in stories easily. Excellent work by Chinmaya mission.

Excellent presentation!
Presented the upanishad knowledge with ease and yet more interesting.

looking for more episodes of upanishad ganaga from 37 to 52
